title: Tikka Masala
description: We love a good homemade curry.. especially when it’s cheap.
steps: Mix marinade ingredients together and leave to marinade for at least 1 hour – overnight. 6 hours done in V2
Cook chicken – on high heat, heat 2 tbsp oil and add chicken once oil is hot. Minimal stirring – every couple minutes. You want the chicken to char. 10 mins and set aside.
To the same pot, add 2 tbsp oil and 1 tbsp butter, Melt until foamy. Add 3 medium finely diced onions and cook until softened, 5-10 mins.
Add 5 minced garlic cloves and 1 tbsp ground ginger. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add spices (1 tsp chilli, 1.5tsp turmeric, 2 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1 tsp garam masala, 2 tsp salt) and 3 tbsp tomato puree. Mix until all onions are well covered and cook for 2 minutes.
Add in 3 medium sized fresh chopped tomatoes and 400g peeled canned tomatoes. Break them down with the spatula and cook, covered for 10-15 minutes, until the colour turns deep.
Add 300ml double cream, 2 tsp brown sugar, large pinch of salt, and the chicken pieces. Cook uncovered on medium high heat for 15-20 mins. Add splash of milk halfway. Serve.
